TopicTitle: Mario Kandretti always cracks me up.

Articles.Content: Have you guys ever noticed any of the others doing wacky things?

Come on, Mario Kandretti??

The name 'Kamui Kobayashi' you don't need to change one letter!

And on this topic, Ludorf Kerman is my hoon. He races Formula K cars, pretty well too.
In the spaceplane hangar, I love watching the fuel trucks drive around doing donuts out in front of the hangar.
I find it amusing when Kerbals obliviously walk right through the bottom parts of the rocket.

There was a big group of engineers the other day, all standing in a tight little circle, all whacking some invisible thing with a wrench.

I wish I would have thought to screencap it, it was pretty good.
I imagine they saw an icky bug scuttling across the VAB floor and everybody had to try and squish it at once xP
